<<<api>>>: Activity.setContentView
<<<code>>>: You can create a separate class and implement the event listeners in its methods. Then, you can use the findViewById method in the activity to get a reference to the views you want to listen to events for.

For example:
```
class MyEventListener : Activity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)
        val myButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.my_button)
        myButton.setOnClickListener {
            // handle button click event
        }
    }
}
```
You can also use the `service` class to run the event listener in the background.
